mapper.select: SELECT level, articleNO, parentNO, title, content, writeDate, imageFileName, id from t_board START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO=parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY articleNO DESC
INSERT into t_board(articleNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) VALUES(#{articleNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.delete: delete from t_board where articleNO in( SELECT articleNO FROM t_board START WITH articleNO = #{articleNO} CONNECT BY PRIOR articleNO = parentNO)
